welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Brookline, known for its beautiful parks, historic homes, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Logan International Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves both commercial and private aircraft.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport is exclusively for private aircraft and their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Lawrence Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Lawrence Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
